00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <hdf.h>
00020 
00037 MTKt_status MtkFileLGID(
00038   const char *filename,    
00039   char **lgid               )
00040 {
00041   MTKt_status status;
00042   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00043   intn hdf_status;
00044   int32 sds_id = FAIL;
00045 
00046   if (filename == NULL)
00047     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00048 
00049   /* Open HDF File */
00050   hdf_status = sds_id = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00051   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00053 
00054   /* Get Local Granual ID */
00055   status = MtkFileLGIDFid(sds_id,lgid);
00056   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00058 
00059   /* Close HDF File */
00060   hdf_status = SDend(sds_id);
00061   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00063   sds_id = FAIL;
00064 
00065   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00066 
00067 ERROR_HANDLE:
00068   if (sds_id != FAIL) {
00069     hdf_status = SDend(sds_id);
00070   }
00071   return status_code;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /* ----------------------------------------------- */
00075 /* MtkFileLGIDFid                                  */
00076 /* ----------------------------------------------- */
00077 
00083 MTKt_status MtkFileLGIDFid(
00084   int32 sds_id,            
00085   char **lgid               )
00086 {
00087   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00088   intn hdf_status;
00089   int32 attr_index;
00090   char attr_name[80];
00091   int32 data_type;
00092   int32 count;
00093   char *attr_buf = NULL;
00094   char *fn_start;
00095   char *fn_end;
00096 
00097   if (lgid == NULL)
00098     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00099 
00100   /* Find attribute index */
00101   hdf_status = attr_index = SDfindattr(sds_id, "coremetadata");
00102   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00103     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDFINDATTR_FAILED);
00104 
00105   /* Get attribute information */
00106   hdf_status = SDattrinfo(sds_id, attr_index, attr_name, &data_type, &count);
00107   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00108     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDATTRINFO_FAILED);
00109 
00110   /* Allocate Memory */
00111   attr_buf = (char*)malloc((count + 1) * sizeof(char));
00112   if (attr_buf == NULL)
00113     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00114 
00115   /* Read attribute */
00116   hdf_status = SDreadattr(sds_id, attr_index, (VOIDP)attr_buf);
00117   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00118     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDREADATTR_FAILED);
00119 
00120   attr_buf[count] = '\0';
00121 
00122   fn_start = strstr(attr_buf, "MISR_AM1_");
00123   if (fn_start == NULL)
00124     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00125 
00126   fn_end = strstr(attr_buf, ".hdf");
00127   if (fn_end == NULL)
00128     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00129 
00130   fn_end += 4; /* Move to end of file name */
00131 
00132   *lgid = (char*)malloc((fn_end - fn_start + 1) * sizeof(char));
00133   strncpy(*lgid,fn_start,fn_end - fn_start);
00134   (*lgid)[fn_end - fn_start] = '\0';
00135 
00136   free(attr_buf);
00137 
00138   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00139 
00140 ERROR_HANDLE:
00141   if (attr_buf != NULL)
00142     free(attr_buf);
00143 
00144   return status_code;
00145 }
